name: @spacerun/archive-cli
description: CLI tool to manage Spacerun app versions and builds

scripts.pkg:macos-arm64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-arm64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:macos-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:linux-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --compress GZip
scripts.pkg:win-x64: npm run build && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --compress GZip

author: Spacerun
